subject: ESPM
name: Honors Colloq
info: Lectures from experts, readings, discussions of current environmental topics/issues. Topics vary, see Class Schedule.

subject: ESPM
name: Environmental Sci & Society
info: Selection of current environmental issues affecting our daily lives. Evaluate the scientific and social approaches necessary to resolve environmental issues. Students explore how everything we do affects the environment in different ways.

subject: ESPM
name: Hon. Sem.
info: Topics presented by faculty, students, guest speakers. Lecture/discussion.

subject: ESPM
name: Honors Research
info: Independent research project supervised by faculty member.

subject: ESPM
name: Honors Research
info: Completion of honors thesis. Oral report.
